thread.title: BRIEF-Amper 9-month revenue down at 85.2 mln euros vs year ago
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Amper 9-month revenue down at 85.2 mln euros vs year ago | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Amper 9-month revenue down at 85.2 mln euros vs year ago
text:
Oct 26 Amper SA :
* 9-month EBITDA 5.1 million euros versus EBITDA loss of 0.8 million euros year ago
* 9-month revenue 85.2 million euros versus 119.6 million euros year ago
* 9-month net profit 86.1 million euros versus loss of 18.2 million euros year ago
* Net debt at end-Q3 42.4 million euros versus 152.4 million euros at end-Dec.
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
